title: Game not starting
body:
The game doesnt start up but instead it keeps saying prepare the game is starting. This didnt only happen to me because everyone in the game didnt start up too. We were telling each other to wait until like 5 minutes past and we all left. When i logged back in it said that i need to reconnect to the game so i tried but the button i clicked wont get me back to the game.

-Apemaster27{{champion:23}} -

replies.body: Same to me. Now im in low priority queue for "leaving". Last time this happened Riot said they couldn't undo the ban. Awesome... Loss and now low priority queue. Hopefully riot give us a response....
Happened to me as well. When I finally Loaded into ranked game, 3 people had left the game. So essentially lost a 2v5 with no loss prevented....

this is also happening to me, went to play a ranked game, game didnt start, went to relog, tells me to reconnect, when i click reconnect, doesnt do anything, the button stay orange. trying to reconnect as we speak. please fix this, because i dont want to be banned for no reason because there was a bug in the client
